vstore.framework.rule

Class VStoreRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • vstore.framework.rule.VStoreRule

  • public class VStoreRule
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a decision rule for the vStore framework.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> contextScores
      Map containing the user-defined scores for each context-type.
      private boolean isGlobal
      Denotes, if the rule is global (true) or user-defined (false).
      private RuleContextDescription mContext
      The context belonging to this rule.
      private java.util.Date mDateCreation
      The creation date of this rule.
      private java.util.List<DecisionLayer> mDecisionLayers
      The node type that will be used if this rule is fulfilled.
      private float mDetailScore
      The detail score of the rule.
      private int mEndHour
      The hour of day this rule should end at (0-24).
      private int mEndMinutes
      The minutes of the hour of day this rule should end at (0-60).
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> mMimeTypes
      A list of mime types this rule should be applied to.
      private long mMinFileSize
      The file size in bytes that a file must have for this rule to be taken into account.
      private java.lang.String mName
      The name of this rule.
      private int mSharingDomain
      The sharing domain (public or private, or both). 1 = private, 0 = public, -1 = match both.
      private int mStartHour
      The hour of day this rule should start at (0-24).
      private int mStartMinutes
      The minutes of the hour of day this rule should start at (0-60).
      private java.lang.String mUUID
      The UUID of this rule.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> mWeekdays
      A list of weekdays this rule should be active at.
      private int replicationFactor
      This number defines, how many decision layers should be used for storage at maximum.
      private boolean storeMultiple
      Denotes, if the rule should store the file on more than one decision layer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VStoreRule

        public VStoreRule()
        Initializes a new empty vStore decision rule

      • VStoreRule

        public VStoreRule(org.json.simple.JSONObject ruleJson)
        Constructs a new VStoreRule from the given json object.
        Parameters:
        ruleJson - The json object representing a rule

      • VStoreRule

        public VStoreRule(java.lang.String ruleJson)
        Constructs a new vStoreRule from the given json string
        Parameters:

      • VStoreRule

        public VStoreRule(java.lang.String uuid,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  java.util.Date creationDate,
                  java.lang.String jsonContext,
                  int sharingDomain,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> weekdays,
                  int startHour,
                  int startMinutes,
                  int endHour,
                  int endMinutes,
                  boolean isGlobal,
                  boolean storeMultiple,
                  int replicationFactor)
        Constructs a new vStoreRule object with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the rule.
        name - The name of the rule.
        creationDate - The creation date of this rule.
        jsonContext - The json representation of the context for this rule that has to be fulfilled such that this rule triggers.
        sharingDomain - 1 = private, 0 = public, -1 = match both. If none of these values is given, the default value of -1 will be used.
        weekdays - A list of weekdays this rule should be active at (from 1=Monday to 7=Sunday).
        startHour - The hour of the time of day at which this rule should start to be active.
        startMinutes - The minutes of the hour of the time of day at which this rule should start to be active.
        endHour - The hour of the time of day at which this rule should end (stop to be active).
        endMinutes - The minutes of the hour of the time of day at which this rule should end (stop to be active).
        isGlobal - Set this to tre, if this rule is a global rule.
        storeMultiple - Set this to true, if a file stored with this rule should be placed on more than one decision layer.
        replicationFactor - This number defines, how many decision layers should be used for storage at maximum.

    • Method Detail

      • parseJSONObject

        private void parseJSONObject(org.json.simple.JSONObject j)

      • setRuleScores

        private float setRuleScores(org.json.simple.JSONObject j)
        Reads the rule scores from json and puts them into the map contextScores. Finally, it calculates the detail score using calculateDetailScore().
        Parameters:
        j - The JSON containing the scores
        Returns:
        The calculated detail score.

      • setMimeTypes

        public void setMimeTypes(java.util.List<java.lang.String> mimetypes)
        Sets the mime types that should trigger this rule. Only those types that are supported will be added.
        Parameters:
        mimetypes - A list of mimetypes to add to this rule.

      • addMimeType

        public void addMimeType(java.lang.String mimetype)
        Adds the given mimetype to this rule. It will only be added if it is not already contained in this rule.
        Parameters:
        mimetype - The mimetype to add, e.g. "image/jpeg".

      • removeMimeType

        public void removeMimeType(java.lang.String mimetype)
        Remove the given mimetype from this rule.
        Parameters:
        mimetype - The mime type to remove.

      • setMinFileSize

        public void setMinFileSize(long filesize)
        Sets the minimum file size that a file must have so that the rule is taken into account.
        Parameters:
        filesize - The minimum file size in bytes.

      • setSharingDomain

        public void setSharingDomain(int sharingDomain)
        Sets the identifier of the sharing domain this rule will match. Must be one of the following: 1 = private, 0 = public, -1 = match both. Will use -1 if an invalid option is specified.
        Parameters:
        sharingDomain - The sharing domain (1, 0 or -1).

      • setWeekdays

        public void setWeekdays(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> weekdays)
        Sets the weekdays this rule should be active at.
        Parameters:
        weekdays - The list of weekdays to assign to this rule.

      • setTimeStart

        public void setTimeStart(int hours,
                         int minutes)
        Sets the time at which this rule should be active. Invalid numbers will be set to 0.
        Parameters:
        hours - The hours of the start time (0-24)
        minutes - The minutes of the start time (0-60)

      • setTimeEnd

        public void setTimeEnd(int hours,
                       int minutes)
        Sets the time at which this rule should stop to be active. Invalid numbers will be set to 0.
        Parameters:
        hours - The hours of the end time (0-24)
        minutes - The minutes of the end time (0-60)

      • setIsGlobal

        public void setIsGlobal(boolean isGlobal)
        Specify, if this rule is a global rule or not.
        Parameters:
        isGlobal - True, if the rule is a global rule.

        public boolean isGlobal()
        Returns:
        True, if this rule is a global rule.

      • setStoreMultiple

        public void setStoreMultiple(boolean storeMultiple)
        Specify, if this rule should store a file on more than one decision layer.
        Parameters:
        storeMultiple - True, if a file stored with this rule should be placed on multiple decision layers.

      • isStoreMultiple

        public boolean isStoreMultiple()
        Returns:
        True, if this rule stores a file on multiple decision layers.

      • setReplicationFactor

        public void setReplicationFactor(int replicationFactor)
        Set the replication factor for this rule. If it is 0 or negative, it will be set to 1.
        Parameters:
        replicationFactor - The replication factor

      • calculateDetailScore

        public float calculateDetailScore()
        Returns:
        The detail score of this rule between 0 and 100.

      • calculateDetailScore_old

        public float calculateDetailScore_old()
        Determines a score for this rule based on how much information is configured. Location: 0-20% - always 5% if loc. context is configured (regardless of detail) - Maximum score: radius of 1m. - Minimum score: radius of 1km or larger. Weekdays: 0-15% - always 5% if weekday ctx is configured (regardless of detail) - Maximum score: Only 1 day configured. - Minimum score: All 7 days configured. Timespan: 0-10% - Maximum score: Timespan of 1 minute - Minimum score: Timespan of 23 hours, 59 minutes Sharing domain: 0-10% - Maximum score: One domain configured (e.g. private XOR public) - Minimum score: Both domains configured Places: 0-15% - always 5% if any number of places is configured - Maximum score: Only one place configured - Minimum score: All place types configured Activity: 0-10% - Maximum score: Activity configured - Minimum score: No activity configured. Network: 0-10% Noise: 0-10%
        Returns:
        The score between 0 and 100. 100 means, the rule has 100% detailed information configured.

      • getDetailScore

        public float getDetailScore()
        Returns:
        The score between 0 and 100. 100 means, the rule has 100% detailed information configured.

      • setDetailScore

        public void setDetailScore(float detailScore)
        Sets the detail score for this rule.
        Parameters:
        detailScore - The detail score.
